name: Burg_325
culture_notes: Speaks Coastal Tongues with Island Creole borrowings
Docks as focus for nightly offerings
Diet heavy on smoked/salted fish and seaweed
constraints: Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned
notes: Rocky inlet harbor, exposed to storms
Small permanent population; seasonal sailors and ritual-pilgrims
